document_data.mainbody:
he Zhanye family of Athkatla was a wealthy and an influential Amnian house in the 14 century DR.
Zhanye was renowned for its gem merchant business, and took on apprentices from outside of the family. One of them was Jared Blevyn, who traveled and purchased diamonds on behalf of House Zhanye before parting ways with the family. By the late 14 century DR, Jared had built his own map-making business Blevynsoar House using the knowledge hed acquired from his busy travels for the Zhanyes.
